channel.title: How can i use the setstring packet? (459 hyperion)
channel.description: Hi, I basically want to change the interface on the spellbook that has text on varrock teleport to something like "Training teleports", how might i do this using the setstring packet?

item.title: How can i use the setstring packet? (459 hyperion)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Check out the wiki… 317 Protocol - RSWiki
It’s packet 126. So you need to look in your server for a method that makes use of packet 126… I can only assume the packet is somewhere in your server already. I would look for a packetmanager, or handler, or something of similar naming.

You could probably go into the source directory (usually the ‘src’ folder) and search ‘packet’… then work from there.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i use the setstring packet? (459 hyperion)
